Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I change the dalvik cache location e.g. with a symbolic link?  I have Huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2.I have activated sd-ext partition using Link2SD, so it's mounted on /data/sdext2, all the ways to move Dalvik cache to sd-ext requires ext partition to be mounted on /sd-ext .Is there any way to move Dalvik cache to anywhere I want? Or at least to the specified location?
Title: How can I move dalvik cache to a custom location(permanently)?

history.Text: I have huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2 .I have activated sd-ext partition using link2sd ,so it's mounted on /data/sdext2 , all the ways to move dalvik cache to sd-ext requires ext partition to be mounted on /sd-ext .Is there any way to move dalvik cache to anywhere I want?or at least to the specified location?
How can I move dalvik cache to a custom location(permanently)?

I have Huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2.I have activated `sd-ext` partition using Link2SD, so it's mounted on `/data/sdext2`, all the ways to move Dalvik cache to `sd-ext` requires ext partition to be mounted on `/sd-ext` .Is there any way to move Dalvik cache to anywhere I want? Or at least to the specified location?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Can I change the dalvik cache location e.g. with a symbolic link?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/20317/can-i-change-the-dalvik-cache-location-e-g-with-a-symbolic-link)  I have Huawei u8160 running Cyanogenmod 7.2.I have activated `sd-ext` partition using Link2SD, so it's mounted on `/data/sdext2`, all the ways to move Dalvik cache to `sd-ext` requires ext partition to be mounted on `/sd-ext` .Is there any way to move Dalvik cache to anywhere I want? Or at least to the specified location?
